Class.name: Custom.QUESTIONNAIREQHARPLETTER
Class.ViewQuery: SELECT ID AS ROWID, Q1 AS Date, Q2 AS NewClient, Q3 AS ExistingClient, Q4 AS IHaveIncludedACopyOfTheActionPlanAndTheCarePlanDevelopedWithThePatient, Q5 AS Management, Q6 AS DOB, Q7 AS Re, Q8 AS TheAbovePatientHasBeenAdmittedOntoTheHARPChronicDiseaseManagementProgram, Q9 AS DearDoctor, Q10 AS IfYouRequireAnyFurtherInformationOrFollowupPleaseContactMeOn, Q11 AS YoursSincerely, QUESDate AS DateUpdated, QUESTime AS TimeUpdated, QUESUserDR->SSUSR_RowId AS UserUpdated, QUESCreateDate AS DateCreated, QUESCreateTime AS TimeCreated, QUESCreateUserDR->SSUSR_RowId AS UserCreated, QUESScore AS Score, QUESStatusDR AS Status FROM questionnaire.QHARPLETTER
